document_data.name: Dannath's Pickles, Nuts, & Foods
document_data.mainbody: '''Dannath's Pickles, Nuts, & Foods''' was a shop located in the city of [[Yartar]] on the [[Savage Frontier]] in [[northwest Faer没n]].
document_data.Operation: It was owned and run by [[Alukk Dannath]] and his three daughters. His daughters were all [[Harpers]].
document_data.Services:
Dannath's Pickles, Nuts, & Foods specialized in providing foods suitable for travelers in the North, that were otherwise scarce in the area. These included dried [[apricot]]s, [[fig]]s, and [[garshell]]s from the [[Tashalar]] and the lands around the [[Lake of Steam]]. The foods were of good quality to suit the high prices.

Dannath found any foods close to spoiling and converted them into another, longer lasting form, such as adding overripe [[fruit]]s in a [[wine]] or a [[syrup]] mash.

Dannath's daughters also offered aid and sanctuary to Harpers in the building's cellars. The cellars led to tunnels running under Yartar, exiting in several places, like [[Wink and the Kiss]] festhall.
